name: Escape Master
description:
This is a jailbreak adventure type of casual game. You can pass the level after avoiding the guards after completing the mission. The characters can be upgraded to improve their own attributes, such as movement, stamina, intelligence, etc. If you like challenges, then take the challenge.

-Achievement system
Complete challenges to get achievement rewards

-Blessing
Rescue the hostages and get blessing rewards

-Prop use
Use items to obtain corresponding effects

-Character style
Choose different character styles

-Character attribute points
Get attribute points for character upgrades, and customize character attributes

-Shop
In the game, a mystery shop will appear every few levels to buy your favorite items
